title: Filter
description: This control renders a Filter FormCell to be used in a filter-options page.

AllowEmptySelection.description:
Disables or enables the selection of empty value set.
Please avoid to set this property as false if you intend to use `FilterFeedbackBar` as well.

AllowMultipleSelection.description:
Disables or enables the selection of multiple entries.
Please avoid to set this property as false if you intend to use `FilterFeedbackBar` as well.

Label.description: Displays label when being displayed as selected item on filter feedback bar.

IsVisible.description: Sets the visibility of the control.

Separator.description: Sets the visibility of the separator line below the control. This property will take precedence over `ControlSeparator` in section and is only supported for Form Cell control in Sectioned Table and not supported in Form Cell Container.

oneOf.description:
Property name for filtering. MDK will try to get its distinct values from the filtered EntitySet.

Caution: Using `FilterProperty` may lead to longer response time or memory shortage when the EntitySet rows are too large. It is advised to use Option 2 or 3 instead. In Option 2, use static values or a Rule, which returns the object of type `FilterProperty` to retrieve from a (small) dictionary EntitySet.

caption.description: The display name of the property for filtering.

FilterProperty.description:
Property of the entities used to filter the EntitySet.

If the resolved value of this property is a string, it will be interpreted as the property name for filtering and the distinct values are retrieved from the EntitySet.

If the resolved value of this property is an object, it means a fixed subset of possible values. It has a `values` property of FixedCollectionSpecifier type. See below for the expected structure.

In a Filter Page, every Filter or ListPicker must have a **unique** `FilterProperty`.

HelperText.description: Helper text to be displayed if there is no validation view. Specifically for Android, the helper text can only be displayed if `AllowMultipleSelection` is true.

OnValueChange.description: Action or rule to be performed after value is changed.

validationProperties.description: Deprecated. Please use `Validation` property. The validation view properties.

Background.description: The string value is a style class name of `Background`.

Caption.description: The string value is a style class name of `Caption`.

_Name.description: The `_Name` value will also function as `CustomQueryGroup` to match with `FastFilters` in `FilterFeedbackBar`.
